short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View All Webpages In Aurebesh (Star Wars Alphabet Font)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you want to view all websites in Aurebesh (The Star Wars Alphabet)? This extension will allow to change the font of any website you visit to Aurebesh. It's a great way to "force" yourself learn Aurebesh. Enjoy, and may the Force be with you.
